channel.title: Need Dclaw spec and how to add!
channel.description: Yea, my client/source doesn't have the Dclaw spec so I need to add the damn thing. Anyone that helps getz t3h 1337 c00ki3z fr0m nate!

item.title: Need Dclaw spec and how to add!
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

9d n 1 n e:

[quote]Ill give u a d claw spec that hits npcs, and players give me a minute k?

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=363374.msg2760018#msg2760018 date=1240458187]
It’s called “google”
[/quote] Dont be a jerk? if ur guna post be helpful not an asshole[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2009, 11:44:42 pm[/size][hr]okay search for 6587

until u see something like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }
then under that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 451, 2927); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 50; }
when u see something like that add the above code under the last } of a special
then u search 6587 again and ull see ths

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; } under that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 451, 2927); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

then open your special.java and search for 6587 again itle say case 6587: then you add your d claws id as case ****: after that search it again and ull see similar add the d claws id again under that (this is so your weapon has a special bar!) replace the ***s with your d claws id and there u have it!

How about stop spoon feeding people and let them learn mk?
and besides that d claws code is all glitched up.[/quote]
it works 100% on npcs and players, and ill spoon feed all i want tyvm?

Read full topic
item.source: Need Dclaw spec and how to add!

item.title: Need Dclaw spec and how to add!
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

Ill give u a d claw spec that hits npcs, and players give me a minute k?
[quote="ChaosPkers, post:2, topic:275047"]It's called "google"[/quote] Dont be a jerk? if ur guna post be helpful not an asshole[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2009, 11:44:42 pm[/size][hr]okay search for [code] 6587 [/code]

until u see something like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }
then under that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 451, 2927); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 50; }
when u see something like that add the above code under the last } of a special
then u search 6587 again and ull see ths

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; } under that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 451, 2927); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

then open your special.java and search for 6587 again itle say case 6587: then you add your d claws id as case ****: after that search it again and ull see similar add the d claws id again under that (this is so your weapon has a special bar!) replace the ***s with your d claws id and there u have it!

How about stop spoon feeding people and let them learn mk?
and besides that d claws code is all glitched up.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Dclaw spec and how to add!
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“pkakidjr1, post:1, topic:275047”]Yea, my client/source doesn’t have the Dclaw spec so I need to add the damn thing. Anyone that helps getz t3h 1337 c00ki3z fr0m nate![/quote] Ill give u a d claw spec that hits npcs, and players give me a minute k?

ChaosPkers:

It’s called “google”

until u see something like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }
then under that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 451, 2927); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 50; }
when u see something like that add the above code under the last } of a special
then u search 6587 again and ull see ths

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; } under that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == **** && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 451, 2927); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

then open your special.java and search for 6587 again itle say case 6587: then you add your d claws id as case ****:
after that search it again and ull see similar add the d claws id again under that (this is so your weapon has a special bar!)
replace the ***s with your d claws id and there u have it!

Read full topic
